casebody.data:
Lee et al., Appellees, v. Toledo Hospital et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Lee v. Toledo Hosp. (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 304.]

No. 85-1246 Decided December 22, 1986. Williams, Jilek & Lafferty Co., L.P.A., Michael F. Jilek, Sr. and Drew R. Masse, for appellees. Shumaker, Loop & Kendrick and William H. Heywood III, for appellant Toledo Hospital. Eastman & Smith, James F. Nooney and Peter R. Casey III, for appellants Lance Talmadge, M.D., Philip L. Kuebbler, M.D., and Drs. Kuebbler and Talmadge, Inc.

The judgment in this cause, having been certified by the court of appeals in case No. L-84-282 as being in conflict with Wainstein v. Univ. *305Hospitals of Cleve. (Apr. 14, 1985), Cuyahoga App. No. 48788, unreported, is hereby affirmed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
